Class Recursive_TIFF_Opener

  • java.lang.Object
    • Recursive_TIFF_Opener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ij.plugin.PlugIn

    public final class Recursive_TIFF_Opener
extends java.lang.Object
implements ij.plugin.PlugIn
    Recursive_TIFF_Opener This class can be used to open all TIFF files in a directory as virtual stack. Each sub-directory in the user selected directory will be searched for any containing TIFF files. The opened virtual stack can be used as input for the 'Process Photon Images' option.

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String arg)
        Run method gets executed when setup is finished and when the user selects this class via plug-ins in Fiji. This method does most of the work, calls all other methods in the right order.
        Specified by:
        run in interface ij.plugin.PlugIn
        Parameters:
        arg - String if about should be shown.
        See Also:
        PlugInFilter.run(ij.process.ImageProcessor)

        public void showAbout()

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method for debugging. For debugging, it is convenient to have a method that starts ImageJ, loads an image and calls the plug-in, e.g. after setting breakpoints. Main method will get executed when running this file from IDE.
        Parameters:
        args - unused
